name: DodgeBall: Unleashed
description: My name is Trent Barta, I'm 18 years old and have been working on DodgeBall: Unleashed since I graduated high school in 2018. This is my first game I've published and am excited to present it to you all. I've had an interest in programming since I was 10 years old and since then I have been developing my skills to enable me to produce video games. I'm an indie developer and everything in this game is made by me.
